description.original: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

dict..setDesc(`Show the view header by defaul:
.setDesc(`Show the view header by default when triggering a hover editor.
         When disabled, view headers will only show if you click the view header icon to the left of the minimize button.`)
dict..setDesc(`Click and hold an image within:
.setDesc(`Click and hold an image within a hover editor to temporarily maximize the popover and image to fill the entire viewport. 
        On mouse up, the hover editor will restore to its original size.`)
